Description: Neuron Guard is developing a medical device the new standard of care for targeted temperature management of brain damages.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Neuron Guard, recognized as the best European startup in HEALTH category (Startup Europe Awards - SEUA 2017), is developing a life-saving medical device that aims to become the standard of care for Targeted Temperature Management (TTM) therapy.  Every 7 seconds around the world a person suffers of Acute Brain Damage because of Cardiovascular Diseases (CVD) and Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI). They are the most costly and prevalent killers in the last 15 years (15 million deaths by CVD in 2015), and the leading cause of disability (the global incidence rate of TBI is 200 per 100k people per year). WHO estimated a global expenditure of $ 330 billion in 2015, but it is going to increase sharply: $ 4 trillion in 2025 - including premature death, disability, and health care costs - just for CVD in LMICs.  Temperature is a vital body parameter. It regulates all cellular functions so its management is essential for the good outcome of patients in several medical conditions such as cardiac arrest, stroke, traumatic brain injury, neuro and cardiac surgery, epilepsy, migraine and oncology. Regulating body temperature at a desired level makes all other treatments more effective. The most modern medical approach is the target temperature management, where physicians try to maintain the most favourable temperature for the patient for up to 24-36 hours, preventing excessive warming (fever) or cooling. Our device is a targeted temperature management system composed by a THERAPEUTIC COLLAR POWERED BY A SMART CONTROL UNIT (the size of a small briefcase). The collar transforms the neck into a natural heat exchanger exploiting several physiological and anatomical characteristics of the human body. It is quicker to act on brain tissue but can also function as total body temperature adjusting device if required. A disposable protective shield makes cleaning the collar after each use simple while featuring an optimal safety profile both in term of pathogens and allergens. The control unit collects all the data of the treatment and transmits them to the Emergency Response System.  Our mission is to improve the safety of patients on the roadside, at home or in the workplace, and to reduce the costs of chronic care. In fact, Neuron Guard aims to be the only device that can be used in every circumstance, inside and outside the hospital, and allow the user to fully manage the temperature of the patient warming and cooling as necessary.  Our vision is to have a Neuron Guard kit in every public place just like the Automatic External Defibrillator (AED) to empower bystanders to immediately react in case of emergency. Under this perspective our device becomes a connected-intelligent platform that takes care of the patient, connects the scene with the Emergency Response System transmitting vital data to improve the readiness and effectiveness of professional intervention. The device is patented in Italy, USA and China. We have made several prototypes in collaboration with Italian and English companies, such as Tecno Elettra Impianti and TWI, tested it in laboratory and published the experimental results on the NeuroCritical Care Journal. We have also conducted a GAP Analysis with another English consulting firm (CDP) and we are testing the human prototype internally.  We are seeking to raise 2.5M€ to complete the pre-industrialization, with design and construction of the human device for the pilot trial, finalized the regulatory clearance and launch it into the market in 2019.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: CDP Venture Capital, Fondo Rilancio Startup, A11 Venture
Most Popular Trademark Class: Medical apparatus and instruments

Soundreef manages the rights of over 25,000 authors and publishers worldwide rewarding them with the fair, transparent and quick payment they deserve for the use of their musical works. Business users such as radio and tv broadcasters, digital service providers, live event organisers, theatres and cinemas, business establishments and music labels can obtain a mandatory license for the use of musical works managed by Soundreef. Soundreef ltd is incorporated in U.K. and owned by Soundreef S.p.A. , a company incorporated in Italy. Soundreef S.p.A. is the company that develops the technology and the content management platform used by Soundreef ltd to audit, collect and maximize royalties for Soundreef authors and publishers. The company process billions of transactions with a focus to improve data security and efficiency in the music industry. Soundreef S.p.A. controls also 100% of Soundreef publishing srl and 100% of Soundreef Media Services srl.

The technological platform is in fact a communication channel that directly connects the consumer with the producer, who can recount their products and distribute them with an excellent delivery service.  Winelivery is therefore an integrated communication and distribution platform dedicated to beverage market. Since its establishment in 2016, it has stood out both for its high growth rates and for its ability to innovate a market dominated by traditional logic.

DESCRIPTION: Operativa nell’ambito insurtech ed in particolar modo nel social insurance.
Note: Sede a Torino e a Cagliari.
Description: Axieme is the Social Insurance insurtech, we reward policyholders with a Giveback to acknowledge their good behavior.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Axieme is an insurtech company based in Italy with a European vocation. Our Social Insurance model rewards policyholders with a giveback to acknowledge their good behavior. Each policyholders is gathered into a group (called “circle") with other policyholders who bought the same insurance product/coverage. Axieme’s algorithm calculates a giveback for each policyholder based on the number of claims filed by the circle members: few claims = high giveback. This improves transparency, awareness and equity while reducing frauds and moral hazards. Axieme is also an insurance platform, developed on API technology. We can deploy our plug-and-play platform in white label to empower partners (banks, carriers, retailers, associations etc.) to offer digital insurance solutions to their communities: customer-base or employees-base or suppliers-base. Partners can then offer welfare and insurance solutions to their communities seamlessly.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Other
Founders: Edoardo Monaco, Marco Pollara, Matteo Gallo
Top 5 Investors: Cassa Depositi e Prestiti, Digital Magics

They target the car rather than the driver, and can assure that a vehicle equipped with Saver1, will not have Texting While Driving accidents.
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Mobile, Transportation

DESCRIPTION: Piattaforma di digital lending dedicata alle PMI focalizzata sull'erogazione di finanziamenti mediante anticipazioni fatture.

Description: Digital Lender for SMEs
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Nata con la missione di semplificare l’accesso al credito per le imprese, Credimi è oggi il più grande digital lender per le imprese in Europa con oltre 2 miliardi di euro di finanziamenti erogati dall’inizio dell’attività e 100 mila richieste di finanziamento presentate dalle piccole e media imprese italiane.  Intermediario finanziario vigilato da Banca d’Italia, Credimi contribuisce alla crescita delle PMI italiane con servizi di finanziamento a medio lungo termine, disponibili per società di persone e di capitali e per ditte individuali.  La capacità di valutare il rischio di credito con tecnologia propria a costi operativi estremamente bassi e la modalità di erogare i finanziamenti direttamente dal proprio bilancio permettono a Credimi di concedere credito alle piccole imprese in tempi molto rapidi. Il funding dei finanziamenti è assicurato da accordi strategici con investitori istituzionali quali Banca Generali, Banca Sella, Banco Desio, Bpm, Banca di Asti e Banca del Piemonte, Deutsche Bank, Intesa Sanpaolo e Banca Popolare Pugliese.  Guidata da Ignazio Rocco, la squadra di Credimi è formata da un gruppo di oltre 90 giovani talenti, con esperienze e tecnologie globali, che possiedono anche la maggioranza assoluta dell’azienda.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Other
Founders: Ignazio Rocco di Torrepadula, Jacopo Anselmi, Sabino Costanza
Top 5 Investors: Tikehau Capital, Vertis, United Ventures, iStarter, Mauro Benetton

DESCRIPTION: Soluzione software, con app integrata, dedicata  al delivery. La società gestisce anche la parte di logistica e trasporto mediante fornitori esterni.
Note:
Rcevuta una bozza di term sheet relativa all'operazione con Futura, che propone agli attuali azionisti di Milkman un earn-out della durata di cinque anni, basato su una valutazione legata all’EBITDA o ai ricavi, con un limite massimo fissato a €5m. Parallelamente, i fondatori di Milkman riceverebbero una partecipazione diretta del 15%, con la possibilità di incrementarla fino al 25% nel tempo.
Fatto CdA il 26/02: deliberata una proroga di un mese per poter consentire il trasferimento di alcuni dipendenti a Futura, cercando di bilanciare questa operazione senza compromettere la disponibilità di cassa. Tuttavia, la situazione si è complicata con l’ingresso di Poste Italiane nella trattativa. Poste, che aveva partecipato al round di investimento precedente, ha avanzato la richiesta di avere la certezza di incassare €1,4m LP del round passato, prima che vengano distribuite altre somme. 
La scorsa settimana si è tenuto un incontro tra Futura e Poste per cercare di sbloccare la situazione, ma al momento non sono emersi aggiornamenti concreti sull’esito della trattativa.
DUE DILIGENCE (appointed advisors):
Assistenza Legale: Accinni, Cartolano e Associati.
DD Legale/Contabile/Fiscale: LTA Studio.
Description: Milkman offers delivery with an unprecedented level of customization for e-commerce operators.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Milkman offers delivery with an unprecedented level of customization for e-commerce operators. Poste Delivery Now is the set of value-added services powered by Milkman that allows customers to customize Poste Italiane's Scheduled Delivery service. This service allows the recipient of the shipment to request delivery on a specific day and in the time slot (even just 30 minutes) that he or she prefers, even in the evening or on Saturday. The service can be selected directly during the purchase phase on the merchant's website, or later, during the delivery rescheduling phase.
Industry Groups: Transportation
Top 5 Investors: Boox

Description: Oval offers an app for financial coaching and planning that helps people save according to their rules.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Oval is a platform designed to tackle the global issue of financial literacy by empowering people to be wiser about their money. Oval helps users save quickly and effectively, by teaching them to monitor spending habits and by making savings automatic. The app also leverages a community experience to make saving more dynamic. They have consulted the brightest minds in personal finance and behavioural economics to develop the artificial intelligence that guides users to better spending and to making regular contributions to their secure digital savings account. With no hidden fees and robust privacy controls, Oval brings trust back into personal finance and opens it to everyone. Oval was launched in 2016, and is based in London, UK and Turin, Italy. The team is committed to driving education, fairness, and financial inclusion in the industry.  Learn more at http://www.ovalmoney.com

Full Description: D-Orbit is an Italian New Space company providing solutions for satellite design, development, launch, commissioning and decommissioning. Founded in 2011, D-Orbit currently employs approximately 35 people. The firm is based in Milan, Italy with subsidiaries in Washington, DC, and Lisbon, Portugal.  D-Orbit's business model revolves around products and services that are profitable, create value for the customer, and have a proven social benefit and a positive impact on the environment. DESCRIPTION: Piattaforma internazionale di matching medicale multilingue focalizzata su viaggiatori ed espatriati. Offre inoltre un e-Health Record multilingue allo stesso target.
Note: Ricercano un investimento da €300k da parte di VC e/o Angel Investors per crescere e prepararsi ad un Round A di finanziamento ad inizio 2019.
Industries: Digital Marketing, Medical, Personal Health, Travel
Description: TripMedic allows travellers and expats to book practitioners who speak their language, are nearby, and are available as required.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: TripMedic is a multilingual medical service providing in-language assistance for the 275 million travellers, expats and immigrants who need it around the world each year. We bring comfort to people who get sick away from home. Feeling ill is always unpleasant, but feeling ill when you are abroad, in a place where you might struggle to be understood, can be frightening. In that moment, you crave a friendly voice that says: “Don’t worry, we’re taking care of you”. That’s why we provide in-language consultations with a specialist within 24 hours – no matter where you are. All it takes is a few clicks to book a consultation and our live concierge service will immediately set you at ease. Where coverage is difficult, we provide video consultations and medical translation capabilities to ensure better outcomes. We are already operating in major European countries, and we are expanding our network to bring Great Care, Everywhere by creating a healthy community of highly qualified practitioners around the world.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Sales and Marketing, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Doriana Landi, Emanuele Cavasassi, Filippo Meloni, Kimon De Simone, Wout Helsmoortel
Top 5 Investors: VentureOut

La società vuole proporre al mercato una soluzione in grado di controllare i parametri del lavoro svolto in un contesto di allenamento, di recupero e di prevenzione: la tecnologia desmodromica. Le attrezzature Desmotec sono strumenti adatti al potenziamento, alla tonificazione ed alla preparazione muscolare. Tutti i dispositivi includono il software proprietario che consente, tra le altre cose, di monitorare in tempo reale la performance dell’allenamento gestendo inoltre un programma globale di know-how sharing volto a sostenere l’innovazione nell’allenamento funzionale. L’allenamento gestito con le macchine isoinerziali non migliora solo la forza o la potenza ma anche l’elasticità ed il controllo neuromotorio del gesto; l’utilizzo regolare riduce sensibilmente l’insorgenza di lesioni muscolari.

Description: Bidoo is an online auction website that allows registered users to bid through direct or reverse auctions.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Bidoo is an online auctions website. Bidoo is a website offering to it's costumer 4 different kinds of auctions: Before participating in any auction the users must register and buy a bid pack, every bid cost approximately 0,70$. 1. Direct Auctions: In this auctions the users place bids on the products they want to buy. Each auction has a countdown starting at 5.00 when the counter reaches 0.00 the last user to bid wins the auction and the product. But, if any user bids when the time left is 15 seconds or less the time increases by 15 more seconds allowing more users to participate.  This kind of auction is very different from eBay, because in eBay the user that pays the most is the one who wins the auction. In Bidoo the winner is the last one to bid. 2. Reverse Auctions: In this auctions the user places a bid for one amount, for example 1,22$ if that amount is the lowest and unique at the end of the auction that user wins. If there are more bids for the same amount or another bid lower and unique is that user the one who wins.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping

I ricavi attesi nel 2024 sono pari a €350k (attualmente stanno lavorando tramite il sito Connexa e Segugio; circa 2k polizze). Entro Q1 2025 partirà la partnership distributiva con Compass con 3 mesi di pilota. Fatturato previsto nel 2025 pari a circa €7m, derivante per il 90% da Segugio e Compass e per il 10% da una terza partneship a cui stanno ancora laborando (65k polizze, di cui 50k da Segugio e Compass).

> Non riteniamo opportuno partecipare a questo round SAFE, in quanto preferiamo prima attendere la partenza di Compass e Segugio per valutare in maniera più concreta un nostro supporto in vista del round series A di giugno 2025.

Connexa continues to be the leader in power management and power products and systems, with a complete line of solar power, UPS systems, controllers, and components. They are located outside of San Antonio, TX in the Texas Hill Country and we deliver power products and accessories for OEM's, integrators, and resellers across the country and around the world. DESCRIPTION:
La società sta sviluppando soluzioni software per il monitoraggio del rischio clinico farmaceutico; vuole, in sintesi migliorare la qualità dei dati e ridurre il time-to-market di un farmaco.
Cyntegrity si sforza di creare un cloud di gestione del rischio completamente automatizzato e centralizzato.
Industries: Clinical Trials, Health Care, Medical, Pharmaceutical, Software
Description: Cyntegrity is an innovative company that provides a specialized software tool for the risk-based monitoring (RBM).
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Cyntegrity (origin: clinical + integrity), an innovative German company inspired by efficiency, provides a specialized software tool for the risk-based monitoring (RBM). They offer high service quality by leveraging the diverse experience from various environments and the learnings about the real variability of errors. They dedicate their selves to providing a specific solution for each customer. Each solution is “tailor-made” and includes the specific culture of each of their clients. Their mission is to help a pharmaceutical company to stay GCP compliant, improve patient safety, make a clinical study more predictable, and optimize monitoring resources. Prevent surprises. They offer trial management tools that are more predictive than retrospective. They integrate the knowledge from previous trials with contextual, real-world data. They strive to simplify safety and regulatory aspects of clinical trials as much as making them transparent and understandable for their customers, allowing to concentrate on medical and organizational aspects and thus run trials with greater confidence and performance. Their vision – creation of a fully automatized, centralized, best in the class risk management cloud platform for improving patient safety, data integrity, and trial transparency.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Software
Top 5 Investors: VentureOut
Most Popular Trademark Class: Scientific and technological services

Description: Snowit is the online travel agency for winter sports holidays
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Snowit is a smart online travel agency that aggregates in one platform all the services for skiers and snowboarders: skipass, equipment rent, ski lessons, experiences and accommodation. Booking snow activities online is not easy, the online market is highly fragmented and poorly organized. In fact, each ski area has its own website and skipass online purchases can generally be done only when already owning the local skipass card. Besides the skipass, booking online a full holiday on the snow is complex because of the lack and fragmentation of the offer. Snowit aims at becoming the reference point for winter-related services in multiple ski areas across Europe, allowing users to easily organize their holidays on the snow by booking online all the services they need from accommodation to ski lessons. Moreover, the Snowitcard, that allows to purchase online the ski pass for all ski resorts in the circuit and to go directly at the lift, is a powerful instrument of promotion and loyalty. Snowit booking engine allows also user to compare the total cost of holiday for multiple destination and to recommend the best destination depending on user profile and needs.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Sports, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Giuseppe Mayer, Pasquale Scopelliti, Riccardo Maggioni
Top 5 Investors: Fnm

DESCRIPTION: Ha sviluppato una piattaforma SaaS per l’automazione conversazionale. Progettata per essere utilizzata senza competenze informatiche, la piattaforma, grazie all’uso dell’IA, fornisce template pronti all’uso per creare chatbot per la generazione di Lead e per il Customer support.
Note:
La Società ha chiuso il 2023 con €60k di ricavi. ARR a giugno 2024 pari a €200k.
Il BP prevede €329k di ricavi nel 2024 e un AuCap di €1m nel 2024.
Raccolti €600k nel 2022 da The Techshop.
In raccolta per €1m (round aperto da settembre). Le risorse saranno utilizzate principalmente per investimenti in marketing&sales, anche con la creazione di un team vendite, e per lo sviluppo prodotto. The Techshop sarebbe disposta ad un follow-on. Commitment di Zest. Sono alla ricerca di un lead investor.

> Presentata ai key men VV6. Principali dubbi: mercato frammentato e popolato da diversi competitors (vedi Spoki); management team non consolidato/stabile (a maggio 2023 era entrato un nuovo CEO, Francesco Caracuta, poi uscito dalla Società).
Bocciata a luglio 2024 con motivazione 1.f. Ci ha riscritto il founder ad ottobre 2024. Hanno raggiunto ARR pari a €250k e sono nell'ultima fase del processo di selezione da parte di un importante player italiano, da cui deriverebbe un contatto dal valore di €70k di ricavi ricorrenti + €30-40k di setup fee. Lato round, stanno definendo con Techshop e Zest gli ultimi dettagli per l'apertura. 
Fatta call di update il 19/11: MRR actual pari a €22k. L'obiettivo è di arrivare a €40k di MRR, specie con un deal in fase avanzata, vale a dire con Aruba (€6k di MRR) e Tecnomat (€2k di MRR). Stanno pensando di aprire l'AuCap a gennaio 2025.
Bocciata a novembre 2024 con motivazione 2.a. Ci ha riscritto il founder a dicembre 2024 per inviarci il BP: gli abbiamo comunicato che escludiamo l'ipotesi di fare da lead investor (potremmo valutare posizione da follower) e richiesto aggiornamenti su BP e round (dovrebbe essere di €1m). Ci terrà aggiornati successivamente.

It stands as a promising solution in the evolving landscape of customer engagement automation.

Full Description: Morpheos is an innovative startup in the ICT field, founded by a tight-knit team of I.T. and electronics engineers, designers and business managers.   We develop software, electronic devices and innovative services based that can have a social and cultural impact.  We set up Morpheos to bring together the critical know-how to deliver products and services. We apply robotics to common interior design objects and Artificial Intelligence to web sites as our contribution to research and innovation that we believe can be self-sustaining and bring people closer to technology.  We have great faith in ingenuity and the ability of individuals to achieve their goals. Ours are widely accessible. We created Momo - The Home Genius, the first Home Robot with "Learn&Adopt" Intelligence. Momo connects to Smart devices present on the market, such as Smart Thermostats, Smart Lamps and Smart TVs, and can interface with traditional appliances, lighting and heating systems through simple adapters, combining their management to amplify the overall user experience.

Description: Domoki is a smart switch that brings Android technology into homes.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Domoki is a smart switch that brings Android technology into homes. The house electrical system advances significantly as a result of artificial intelligence and the inventive application of the Android operating system. Many electronic gadgets inside the home can be made smarter by using tiny sensors, actuators, and wireless detectors that are easily programmable thanks to the Zigbee standard. Domoki and Zigbee can also be used to measure electricity usage and check for errors or faults. Technology and financial savings without demanding job at home.
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Real Estate

Full Description: Developer of digital marketing platform intended to simplify and accelerate the digital transformation and make it accessible to everyone. We can provide solutions that allow companies to connect with their customers, real and potential, like never before. We’re all about supporting local businesses. And we feel good about that.

Hanno un business model B2B2C, attraverso i fisioterapisti arrivano al cliente finale. Description: Orobix implements and manages the lifecycle of artificial intelligence solutions.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: At Oròbix, we implement and manage the lifecycle of artificial intelligence solutions. They can be newly designed or integrated into existing systems, spanning a wide range of industries from healthcare to manufacturing, from gaming to energy. We offer this service through Invariant.ai, our deployment, monitoring and governance platform for AI systems. Invariant.ai® can reduce the time to value (TTV) of AI systems, maximize ROI, and guarantee conformity and reliability in all business contexts that involve artificial intelligence.  As an AI service company, we can accompany our clients throughout the entire AI lifecycle, end-to-end, from problem set-up to deployment and monitoring in production. We have learned from our extensive experience that this integrated approach ensures optimized timelines and a quick return on investment (ROI). We use data to decipher reality, turn its complexity into new operational knowledge and technological solutions. In 10 years working in the field and completing over 100 projects, we have designed AI-based solutions for our clients that allowed them to streamline QC operations on manufacturing lines, provide support for medical diagnoses, and optimize production processes. Our team of data scientists monitors the behavior of  AI systems in real time through monitoring algorithms that assess reliability, safety and security during pre-deployment auditing as well as in process. Our clients can thus use AI in a way that is safe, reliable and constantly monitored, and fully leverage the potential of their data.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Software
Most Popular Trademark Class: Scientific and electric apparatus and instruments

Description: AR Market innovative startup operates in the Immersive Technology market (AR/VR/Virtual Spaces 360°) fo different B2B verticals.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: AR Market operates in the AR/VR/MX Reality market with focus on B2B, Training and Education. We use immersive tech to create content and business applications, increasing user experience and retention. For B2B, we offer AR experiences in-App, VR Situational Training and 360° Virtual Spaces empowered by AR/VR experiences and gamification for Events, Retailing, Tourism and Training. In Edtech, we reinvent through AR/VR and gamification, books, stories, game boards and arts creating more powerful educational products for the world. We exhibited in international Tech Events and Pitch competitions globally (Rise Hong Kong, Web Summit Lisbon, Awe USA, Startup Grind London, Web Marketing Festival, Unicorn Battle Milan, CES Las Vegas 2021, VIVA Tech Paris 2021). We received various awards for our products and ideas: Horizon 2020 “Seal of Excellence”, “Ernst & Young Special Prize” in the context of "Premio Marzotto 2019”, The Hive-SIDA Business School and AWS Prizes at Web Marketing Festival 2020. Some of our success milestones are: a) 360° Virtual Spaces developed for Fao/Eufmd, P&G; b) development of B2B App (for ESA and Duracell), AR Market Junior App and 2 Apps for Kids (The Ugly Duckling and Logopedia game); 4 AR Publications commercialized online through owned ecommerce and global marketplaces, out of which the very first AR/VR adventure book for kids combining educational content in AR & VR. Ready to launch a SAAS Packaged Virtual Space platform by Oct2022 as a bridge to the Metaverse. Traction: €215K revenues in 2021 (tripled vs 2019 totally self-funded), >10K Apps downloads, >7K web users and >21K monthly views; estimated €130mm revenues by 2026. Key Customers: P&G Italia, Esa (European Space Agency), Duracell Italia, Fao/Eufmd, Sisal, Faro Spa, Marshall, Fonte, Archeogeo. Key Partners: Assintel, ConfCommercio, Tim Digital Store, Sellmasters, AR Cloud, ICE/Italian Trade Agency, Musemio Ltd, Space 42, Remedia, Coderdojo Rome. AR Market Team has multifunctional expertise and competencies. It is made of 5 Cofounders with a mix of Corporate and Entrepreneurial experience, and a staff including marketers, developers, graphic design and 3D artists. AR Market is self-funded startup. We gained a Smart & Start reimbursable funding in 2021 and we were selected to enter an Accelerator program by RS Production (Immediate Accelerator in partnership with Intesa San Paolo, HFarm. Opinno, RollingStone) in May 2022. We are looking for a 1st round of funding to scale up fast, expanding our team, R&D, marketing investments and growing commercial partnerships.

DESCRIPTION: Soluzione per Industrial IOT Plug&play.
Note:
Fatto incontro di aggiornamento per il 22/1.
Revenue model e strategia di valorizzazione ancora in corso di definizione.
Nel 2018 hanno fatturato circa €0,7m vs €0,4m del 2017; hanno sviluppato 5.000 driver.
Sviluppate partnership con Cisco ed Advantech.
Industries: Energy Efficiency, Industrial Automation, Industrial Manufacturing, Internet of Things
Description: Industry 4.0 plug&play. Enabling an Open ecosystem of Machines and Applications.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: INDUSTRY 4.0 IS CHANGING EVERY ASPECT OF HOW INDUSTRY OPERATES. Every process and activity can be optimized, networked, and made smarter by exploiting machines’ embedded intelligence to manage their operations, production processes, integrate information across enterprise own processes and within the extended supply chain. Alleantia provides the most scalable and cost-effective Industrial IoT solution in the market for data collection, information standardization and distribution from wire to cloud, to implement pervasive machines data access and comprehensive information sharing within the enterprise and across its extended supply chain. Alleantia software connects in few seconds any device — from complex machinery to simpler sensors — to create a complete and interoperable digital twin for each new or legacy industrial equipment, supporting a vast majority of industrial protocols and communication interfaces with a innovative, agile codeless 'driver' model  Instantly feed selected data into multiple enterprise IT applications and clouds through certified ‘IIoT Apps’, with full control from end user.  Alleantia software provides multiple ways to use machine data, from Digital Twin IIoT Apps that instantly feed machine information to IT development platforms, or publish machine data using specific communication protocols, to Alleantia IIoT Apps using machine data within embedded applications or public application platforms, to Application Ecosystem IIoT Apps with many Industry 4.0 applications “connected by Alleantia”. Dozens of Application partners, hundreds of systems and machines connected, large customers and machines manufacturers adopting our technology makes Alleantia software the reference solution for implementing an open, scalable and future-prood Industrial IoT architecture, supported by bespoken hardware vendors such as Dell, Advantech and Cisco.
Industry Groups: Energy, Internet Services, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Sustainability
Founders: Antonio Conati Barbaro, Marco Bicocchi Pichi, Stefano Linari
Top 5 Investors: Momenta, Guanxi, Alberto Giusti, Stefano Linari

DESCRIPTION: Piattaforma low code, basata su componenti preconfigurati. La soluzione combina i vantaggi delle soluzioni DXP-Digital Experience Platform (focalizzate sull’ottimizzazione della customer experience su diversi canali e dispositivi) con quelli dei tool RAD-Rapid Application Development (incentrate sulla velocizzazione e l’efficientamento dei processi di sviluppo).
Note:
Proseguono, con il supporto di Deloitte, le discussioni con Expert.AI, sia in merito al progetto Villanova/Tiscali sia su potenziali opportunità di M&A. 
Ricevuto il business plan aggiornato (stand alone) con il contratto IPCEI. Lato IPCEI: il Ministero ha accordato un ulteriore mese per trovare fidejussione (quindi 15/3); la nuova struttura dovrebbe prevedere una collaborazione tra Tiscali e Expert.AI, ma al momento Deloitte non ha informazione puntuali.
Mostrati i risultati di gennaio: cassa: €755k; PFN: €333k; Ricavi: €74k; revenued booked 2025: €708k; Pipeline totale: €20m di cui €8,6m in fase 5;  personale: 33 persone.
Fatto business update il 7/03: Il prodotto Entando Operations è in fase di beta testing e il rilascio finale è previsto per la fine di marzo, secondo la roadmap. Questo strumento mira a semplificare la gestione della tecnologia cloud native, offrendo un catalogo con circa 40 componenti preconfigurati, 63 blueprint di deployment già pronti e 11 connettori per la gestione di digital asset. La soluzione sta attualmente testando l'integrazione con sette cloud provider. Sono già attivi tre tenant nella fase di beta testing (Intesis, Orbyta e Peer Network).
DUE DILIGENCE (appointed advisors):
DD e assistenza legale: Lipani, Catricalà & Partners.
DD Contabile/Fiscale:  LTA Studio.
Industries: Enterprise Applications, Enterprise Software, Open Source
Description: Entando is an open-source vendor providing an Application Composition Platform for building Composable and Cloud-Native Apps
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US
Full Description: Entando is an Application Composition Platform (ACP) that enables IT/Developer teams to better collaborate with business users to build, deploy, run, and manage cloud-native applications. It does this by providing a low-code application builder that allows users to compose or recompose applications from shareable, modular business components. This approach to application development offers several benefits, including: Increased agility: Composable applications can be developed and deployed more quickly and easily than traditional monolithic applications. Reduced cost: Entando can help businesses reduce the cost of developing and maintaining applications by eliminating the need for custom development. Improved time to market: Entando can help businesses get their applications to market faster by streamlining the development process. Increased innovation: Entando can help businesses increase innovation by making it easier for developers to experiment with new ideas. Entando is a leading open-source ACP that is used by a variety of organizations, including Fortune 500 companies. It is recognized by Gartner as an ACP Sample Vendor in the Cloud Services Platform HypeCycle. Here are some of the key features of Entando: Low-code application builder: Entando provides a low-code application builder that makes it easy for business users to create and modify applications without writing code. Shareable, modular business components: Entando applications are built from shareable, modular business components. This makes it easy to reuse components across different applications and to update components without affecting other parts of the application. Cloud-native support: Entando supports cloud-native technologies such as Kubernetes and Docker. This makes it easy to deploy and manage Entando applications on cloud platforms. If you are looking for a way to build more agile, cost-effective, and innovative applications, then Entando is a good option to consider.
Industry Groups: Apps, Software
Founders: Claudio Ambu, Paul Hinz, Walter Ambu
Top 5 Investors: United Ventures, Vertis, GELLIFY
Most Popular Trademark Class: Scientific and technological services

Description: Network Intelligence provides software and hardware network security appliances for security information and event management markets.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Full Description: Network Intelligence Corporation provides security information and event management solutions. Its products include enVision that collects and protects data, as well as provides security and compliance analysis, and reporting and alerting solutions; Intelligence Engine software/hardware network security appliances for security information and event management market; and LogSmart Internet Protocol Database, which provides architecture to collect and protect the data from various Internet protocol devices. The company's strategic partners include Microsoft; NetworkAppliance; IBM; EMC2; EDS; Check Point Software Technologies, Ltd.; and Juniper Networks. Network Intelligence Corporation was formerly known as OpenSystems.com, Inc. and changed its name to Network Intelligence Corporation. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Westwood, Massachusetts. It also has offices in Rancho Santa Margarita, California; Chicago, Illinois; Alpharetta, Georgia; Seabrook, Texas; Arlington, Virginia; Amsterdam, the Netherlands; Paris, France; and London.

DESCRIPTION: Iniziativa con tecnologia innovativa intregata nella pavimentazione sopraelevata che converte, per effetto piezoelettrico, l'energia cinetica dei passi in energia elettrica pulita. La soluzione Veranu viene impiegata per alimentare luci LED e rilevare posizione e movimento dei passanti, applicazioni utili in tematiche come sicurezza, consumer tracking e data collection.
Note:
Al primo anno prevedono di fatturare circa €320k.
Valutazione pre-monet: €2.5m, target raise: €500k, equity stake offered: 16.7%.
Troppo seed per VV2.
Description: Veranu is a smart floor technology that produces electricity through foot traffic
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Veranu is a project that since 2012 has been working towards the creation of a new product that generates alternative energy, and has since become a reality. Our idea aims to create an innovative technology that can be installed in any kind of floor, with the ability to generate clean electricity by simply walking on the smart tiles. The smart tiles are constructed with market plastic materials available and are completely recyclable. Our smart floor was conceived through innovative thinking through the perception of not seeing it as a passive object, but as an active instrument capable of generating green energy. The materials used for its construction include polylactic acid (PLA).
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Energy, Sustainability
Founders: Alessio Calcagni, Giorgio Leoni, Simone Mastrogiacomo
Top 5 Investors: Clhub

DESCRIPTION: La risonanza magnetica (MRI) è lo strumento più utilizzato per diagnosticare, monitorare e prevenire le patologie e più del 50% delle scansioni MRI (100k/anno nel mondo) richiedono Agenti di Contrasto (CA). Kyme NanoImaging Srl ha ideato una nuova formulazione per sostituire definitivamente i CA esistenti per la risonanza magnetica, combinando biomateriali con agenti di contrasto clinici. Sviluppati grazie a una piattaforma nanotecnologica brevettata, questi prodotti aumentano la capacità di contrasto per rendere i dettagli anatomici maggiormente visibili.

DESCRIPTION: Utilizza la tecnologia per liberare il mercato secondario dei beni di lusso di frodi e pregiudizi nei prezzi, offrendo un maggiore accesso a prodotti autentici e di alta qualità.

Description: Verado empowers people to monetise their belongings, instantly.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Verado is a global technology platform designed to empower everyone to instantly monetize their belongings. Whether selling an old laptop or unlocking cash by collateralizing valuables for a loan, our technology is crafted to enable consumers to do so with unprecedented ease. Snap a picture of your electronics, valuables, apparel or other belongings, get an instant appraisal through our real time valuation engine, and receive a direct payout to your bank account immediately. We are a deep technology company, envisioning a world where products’ lifecycle is lengthened and the ecological burden of trashing minimised.  What exists currently is falling short of the experience modern consumers expect. They value convenience, comfort and speed, and don’t deem existing selling channels even marginally satisfactory. They are tired of the tedious paper-work, negotiating with uncommitted buyers through outdated messaging systems, managing the logistics, and the time-consuming nature of the process. Through our innovative solutions, we are cutting down from days to seconds the time it takes to receive a valuation; and from weeks to hours, the time necessary to sell! Verado is changing the rules of the game - It’s simplicity, re-engineered. We believe selling should be as seamless as buying. Therefore, rather than accumulating unused products at home or worse letting them end up in a landfill forever -  we enable individuals to monetize their unwanted things, free up valuable space in their home and reduce their need for borrowing whilst simultaneously minimizing their ecological footprint.
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods, Internet Services, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software
Founders: Claudio de Giovanni, Mirko de Giovanni
Top 5 Investors: Banco BPM, Verado Capital, Fin Posillipo Spa, Mirko de Giovanni, White Hope Holding

Ci sono poi ulteriori €25m di progetti presentati durante il 2024 che dovrebbero tramutarsi in contratti e vendite nel 2025.
Raccolti €2,5m tramite safe da precedenti e nuovi soci. Il nuovo investitore è Ferrari Family Office. Questo rappresenta un bridge al series B round del 2025. L'obiettivo per il 2025 è diventare profittevoli.

> Lato round, inviate nostre proposte in merito alle principali clausole contrattuali (termine per il closing fissato al 30/04). Il ticket di Vertis è di €3,5m e le condizioni seguiranno il precedente safe.
Il round series B previsto nel 2025 (che porterebbe alla conversione del safe) è di €10m.
Lato DD, fatto incontro il 13/02 con KPMG; ricevuta definizione scope of work (costo €28k). Richiesto anche preventivo per DD ESG. Riceveremo anche preventivo da Mazars.
Fatta call con CFO il 5/03: ci ha comunicato che la S.p.A. dovrebbe chiudere il 2024 con una perdita netta ante imposte di €1m (vs. €4m del 2023). Nei risultati 2024, hanno anche incluso contributo di €1m (resta pending un secondo contributo legato alla regione Puglia, per cui sono in attesa della corte dei conti. Per questo motivo, ipotizzano di rimandare a giugno l'approvazione del bilancio 2024). 
I bilanci degli ultimi due anni sono stati revisionati da Deloitte. Inoltre, nel corso del 2024, su richiesta interna, è stata coinvolta Mazars per un'opinion sul BP (ricevuto report).
In corso redazione del nuovo BP consolidato con il supporto di un consulente americano.
Condiviso TS alla controparte; ci hanno detto che per loro va bene, da aggiungere solo una specifica nel paragrafo relativo ai costi.
Fissata call con CFO l'11/03.

Description: Roboze is re-shaping the manufacturing industry with the most precise 3D Printing technology for the most performing super materials.

Full Description: Roboze is re-shaping the manufacturing industry and revolutionizing the world of 3D Printing with the most precise technology, capable of processing super polymers and composite materials for the realization of finished functional parts to be used in the most extreme conditions and sectors. The Roboze high technical ecosystem includes a complete range of advanced 3D printers for high temperature and high strength super plastics, developed with the collaboration of the best global players. DESCRIPTION: Realizza orti verticali dotati di sistemi di irrigazione automatica, che non prevedono l'utilizzo di terra, bensì fibra di cocco, e di un assistente digitale (app installata su smartphone) per fornire tutte le informazioni utli per la coltivazione.

Fondata nel 2016.
La Società ha ad oggi 2 prodotti sviluppati ed industrializzati (IP pronto per altri prodotti in futuro), quali Poty e Living Farming Tree. Poty è un orto verticale per la casa, LFT per gli uffici. LFT è ancora in fase di test per l'ingresso sul mercato.
Revenue model: 1) vendita del kit per la realizzazione dell'orto verticale tramite e-commerce (di Hexagro ed altri) e distributori. Nel caso di Poty sono previste due misure, S ed L, a seconda delle piante che possono contenere (20 nel primo caso e 40 nel secondo), al costo rispettivamente di  €169 e  €229; 2) vendita di piante, risorse e kit di coltivazione; 3) servizi di manutenzione .
Nel 2021, sono state vendute 180 unità di Poty e si prevede di raggiungere +1.500 unità nel 2022E. Per il prodotto Poty, nel 2020 sono stati realizzati ricavi per €15k, nel 2021 per €25k e un MRR dall'e-commerce  pari a  €3k. Inoltre, sono stati firmati  accordi di distribuzione per oltre  €150k.
Il team  è composto da 8 persone (devono assumere  prevalentemente Sales).
La Società è in raccolta per €2m (pre-series A round), di cui €500k da impiegare in Q2-Q3 2022 per accelerare la crescita del prodotto Poty e €1,5m da impiegare in Q1 2023 per l'espansione in Europa e l'ingresso sul mercato del prodotto LFT.

Description: Your Cloud. Your Rules. Anywhere. Cubbit is the 1st geo-distributed cloud Enabler. Compose your S3 cloud in minutes, benefit for years.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Cubbit is more than a cloud provider; it’s the 1st geo-distributed cloud Enabler. With just a few clicks, you can customize a hyper-resilient cloud object storage under your own sovereignty. Cubbit’s DS3 (Distributed S3) software runs anywhere - on your existing resources, in the cloud or at the edge - creating a seamless single data domain for you. No upfront investment is required, and you can reduce storage costs by up to 80% as well as minimizing your cloud carbon footprint. Ideal for traditional use cases like backup and unique to address new needs driven by Edge, Multi-cloud, and Data Sovereignty requirements. As a company or a Service Provider, with Cubbit you can get back full control on data, infrastructure, and costs. In minutes. In one claim: Your Cloud. Your Rules. Anywhere.

DESCRIPTION: Data intelligence platform che consente alle aziende ed alle agenzie media/marketing,attraverso algoritimi d'intelligenza artificiale, di ottenere dati dal web, social network ed altre fonti, relativi a specifiche audience, come open data e trasformarli in insights.
Note:
Rejected con motivazione 1.h (percorso di crescita attuale e prospettico non chiaro, da dimostrare crescita estera e velocità di execution) a febbraio 2022, rejected ad aprile 2023 per percorso di crescita attuale.
Prodotti/servizi offerti:
- OdienceListen: Uno strumento di analisi che scandaglia il web per scoprire tendenze e abitudini dei consumatori, offrendo dati cruciali per capire il mercato e le preferenze del pubblico.
- OdiencePeople: Analizza e trasforma grandi quantità di dati in profili dettagliati dei consumatori. Con l'aiuto di OdienceTalk, permette di interagire direttamente con queste "personas", ottenendo così una comprensione più approfondita del pubblico.
- OdienceResearch: Impiega cloni digitali per effettuare ricerche di mercato, come sondaggi, focus group  e A/B test, fornendo informazioni strategiche sui comportamenti dei consumatori.
- OdienceAds: Integra le informazioni da OdienceListen, i profili di OdiencePeople e gli insight di OdienceResearch per creare campagne pubblicitarie mirate e personalizzate, superando i limiti dei metodi tradizionali basati su cookie.
Non possiedono brevetto ma sono first moover per quanto riguarda il prodotto OdienceADS e OdienceResearch
Revenue model: SaaS
Team: 30 persone
ARR 2023: circa €3m

In the field of power conversion, Eggtronic launched the smallest and most efficient AC/DC converter in the world, thanks to our patented EcoVoltas technology. In the field of wireless power, Eggtronic developed a completely new wireless power transfer. Full Description: Eligo Milano is the first Marketplace at a global level able to link customers, personal stylists and Italian high-quality brands. Eligo’s goal is to become the largest Stylist Marketplace in Europe and Asia as well. How? On the one hand, we have developed our digital platform, Eligo Live: by that our personal stylists manage each customer experience from remote, analyzing their preferences and showing them the best choices among our products. This tool allows our stylists to select all the available products and create an out-and-out virtual outfit while interacting with the customer. On the other hand, we have created our Academy where the stylists are trained on a weekly basis: by that they have the possibility to learn how to boost their own business and gain more customers in the fashion world thanks to our team of financial and marketing experts and high-tech professionals.

Description: At Aindo, our mission is to enable Artificial Intelligence (AI) to add value to society while respecting people's rights and freedoms.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: At Aindo, our mission is to enable Artificial Intelligence (AI) to add value to society while respecting people's rights and freedoms. We achieve this mission through the Aindo Synthetic Data Platform. Synthetic data form a revolutionary new paradigm in privacy protection and fairness. They are hyper-realistic, yet artificial and devoid of sensitive information. They replace personal data or rebalance biased datasets for safe and fair analysis. Synthetic data allows us to responsibly seize the wealth of opportunities AI presents. This is invaluable in sectors such as healthcare, finance, infrastructure, and policymaking. Aindo is one of the first teams dedicated to synthetic data. We actively further the state-of-the-art. Our platform’s best-in-class performance and advanced capabilities reflect this. We offer an effortless user-experience. This allows both experts and non-experts to integrate synthetic data directly in their data projects, even when their data assets are siloed; unstructured; unlabeled; and contain advanced data types and formats.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Borut Svara, Daniele Panfilo, Sebastiano Saccani
Top 5 Investors: United Ventures, Vertis, EIC Accelerator, European Data Incubator, Vertis Venture 3 Tech Transfer

DESCRIPTION: Software AI based per il riconoscimento documentale.
Note:
Iniziativa bocciata nell'estate del 2023 per motivi legati allo scenario competitivo. Ci è stata risegnalata ad ottobre 2024. 
Fatta call di update il 28/11: chiuderanno il 2024 con €3m di fatturato. Prevedono di arrivare a €7m nel 2025. In raccolta per un round di €5-10m per consolidare il team e inizare ad espandersi all'estero.
Se il round è da €5m, valtazione pre-money di €20m; se è da €10m, valutazione pre-money pari a €30m. Hanno ricevuto proposte per VC ed M&A. Lato VC, hanno ricevuto un commitment da LIFTT per €1m, CDP fondo Sud o deeptech (follow-on) e da FonTe per €5m (soft commitment). Inoltre avevano ricevuto una proposta per Venture Debt da BEI da €15m con upfront a €2m, hanno anche ricevuto il TS ma l'operazione è rimasta congelata. Siamo rimasti che ci saremmo aggiornati reciprocamente a gennaio per capire un nostro supporto con il coinvolgimento di altri investitori privati per arrivare al 30% (auspicabilmente sul round da €5m). 

> Fatta call di update il 19/02: avevano iniziato discussioni per un'operazione di M&A con una società quotata italiana (Txt). Post esito positivo delle DD condotte, l'operazione è stata messa in stand-by a causa di ritardi in termini di ricavi 2024. Le discussioni su M&A riprenderanno quando la società raggiungerà il BE nel 2027. Intanto, il gruppo industriale sarebbe disposto ad investire in AuCap €4m. Le opzioni sono: (i) pre-money a €20m se CDP vende le sue quote, (ii) pre-money a €13m se CDP non vende le sue quote.
Fatta ulteriore call di aggiornamento il 5/03: ci hanno proposto di effettuare un investimento in AuCap per €4m. La cassa terminerà a maggio 2025. 
Firmare NDA per ricevere documentazione da analizzare in attesa delle discussioni tra CDP e Txt.
Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Machine Learning, SaaS, Software
Description: ALTILIA is an intelligent automation company providing composite AI solutions to automate business processes and turn data into insights.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Altilia is a leading intelligent automation software company on a mission to democratize the use of AI and to help enterprises automate document-intensive business processes. Altilia's team consists of highly experienced AI professionals, including scientists, researchers and engineers, ready to partner with you to help solve business challenges across your organization. Altilia's no-code SaaS-based platform enables users from all backgrounds — from highly technical to business oriented — to easily transfer knowledge into algorithms to automate document processing across all areas of their business. Using a range of sophisticated machine learning capabilities, the Altilia platform enables businesses to build AI models capable of processing all types of documents, with varying degrees of complexity. Customers can easily extract data from simpler, form-like documents (including invoices, orders and other forms) while also processing complex unstructured documents (like financial statements, balance sheets and annual reports) with the precision and accuracy of real humans. Altilia's platform can provide custom document processing automation solutions across several industries, with a current focus on Banking, insurance, utilities, retail, securities. Use case applications can range from Content Acquisition and Classification, Price Intelligence, Sentiment Analysis, Customer Profiling, Fraud Detection, Anti-Money Laundering, Portfolio Valuations, Risk Profiling, Data Integration and Virtualization. Altilia has been recently listed by Gartner among representative IDP  software providers in a fast-growing market, and furthermore into a small subset of vendors who are developing their own marketplaces. This means transitioning from the traditional approach (bespoke project with project and implementation times and costs) to a ‘out of the box’ approach with bundled solutions ready to use.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: CDP Venture Capital, CDP Equity
Most Popular Trademark Class: Scientific and electric apparatus and instruments

Description: Utopia is an enterprise data solutions provider that leverages its proprietary Enterprise Data Lifecycle Management (EDLM) methodology.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Full Description: Etopia, Inc. is a global Enterprise Data Solutions provider that leverages its proprietary Enterprise Data Lifecycle Management (EDLM) methodology. It serves customers in multiple industries, including oil & gas, mining, utilities, manufacturing, high tech, consumer goods and retail, with unique methodologies to deliver significant cost savings and improvements that help unleash the true potential of the enterprise. Its solutions include strategic roadmap development, systems integration, data strategy and master data management (MDM), as well as data migration, quality and governance services. The company has its global headquarters in Mundelein, IL, just north of Chicago and was founded by Arvind Singh, Narinder Singh and Andres Martin. Utopia's international presence includes offices in USA, Canada, Europe, Middle East, India, Asia Pacific and most recently Latin America.

DESCRIPTION: La società è attiva nella creazione di simulatori chirurgici realistici, che consentono di esercitarsi su interventi chirurgici, superando la formazione tradizionale ancora basata sulla pratica su pazienti e/o cadaveri.

Description: UpSurgeOn is a MedTech company specialized in life-like surgical simulation, virtual/mixed reality, surgical assessment and AI.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: UpSurgeOn is a MedTech company that helps surgeons, scientific institutions and medical device companies worldwide to boost the transition to cadaver-free training, a booming trend in healthcare at a global level. The company developed a disruptive combination of technologies: life-like simulations, virtual/mixed reality, data collection and AI.  The solutions are currently focused on microsurgeries (neurosurgery, plastic surgery, ENT surgery, maxillofacial surgery, and spine surgery) and are expanding to several other surgical disciplines. The team is built by surgeons, digital developers, 3D artists, engineers, manufacturers, simulation artists, designers and business developers. UpSurgeOn was founded in 2017 by two neurosurgeons, Dr. Federico Nicolosi (Founder and CEO) and Dr. Giannantonio Spena (Co-founder) and is headquartered in Milan, Italy with a second branch in the US (Delaware).   UpSurgeOn's technologies are available in 99 countries today. The network of users includes more than 300 scientific institutions and more than 100 medtech companies worldwide.

Description: Emotiva is a deep tech artificial intelligence company specialized in measuring human's attention and affective states.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Emotiva is a deep tech artificial intelligence company specialized in measuring human's attention and affective states. It has developed computer vision and machine learning algorithms to detect and analyze micro facial movements encoded as Action Units (AUs), units of activation of a muscle or muscle groups that configure the expression of an emotion. Considering emotions a value of absolute importance, Emotiva has established the ethical-scientific committee that oversees the development of technology and ethics of artificial intelligence, taking into account the aspects related to privacy and GDPR laws. Emotiva actively collaborates with the PHuSE Lab, the Computer Science department of the University of Milan, and the top Italian Universities in computer vision and robotics fields for R&D activities. Emotiva has developed EmPower, a SaaS platform in media analytics, to analyze emotional responses and measure people's attention levels while watching content. It has made a process that used to be complex and costly, easy and fast. Today it is possible to get insights on unconscious response in just a few clicks. Thanks to EmPower, companies make more accurate decisions and avoid wasting their budget on target segments that are poorly connected emotionally or lack attention.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Andrea Lori, Andrea Sempi, Lorenzo Corbo
Top 5 Investors: LVenture Group

DESCRIPTION: Piattaforma proprietaria per prenotare servizi di deposito e trasporto degli oggetti on-demand.
Note:
Bocciata a settembre 2022 con motivazione 1.a (da risentire), ci è stata risegnalata a giugno 2023. Rejected a settembre 2023 con motivazione 1.f.
Lancio a marzo 2021 su Roma. Lancio a Milano e Bologna a gennaio e maggio 2022.
La piattaforma permette di prenotare online, avendo visibilità del preventivo, servizi di: ritiro degli oggetti (con la possibilità di un team dedicato che si occupa di smontaggio ed imballaggio), trasporto, deposito flessibile (si paga solo per lo spazio utilizzato, senza vincoli di tempo) e riconsegna. La società opera sia sul canale B2C (traslochi, ristrutturazioni, etc.), sia B2B (attrezzature stagionali, etc.). 
Revenue model: 1) sottoscrizione di un piano di deposito a partire da €50 / mese; 2) servizi one-off con prezzo customizzato.
Aggiornamenti: 
2023: €115k (monthly revenue) 45% B2B e B2B2C.
Gross margin: 30%
AOV: €1,945

Partner B2B: McKinsey & Company, Oliver Wymann, Azimut, Everly ecc..

Fundraising: a dicembre non hanno chiuso il round previsto da €3,5m, hanno fatto un debito con ISP da €400k (a 4 anni) e sono entrati con Smart&Start per €500k (accettati a gennaio). Oggi sono in raccolta per €3,5m
Aggiornamenti giugno 2024: cresciuta la componente B2B2C / B2B, ordine medio per cliente passato a €1,945 completato gli sviluppi della tecnologia RFID per la gestione degli oggetti e depositato la domanda di brevetto lo scorso gennaio. Description: Aptus.AI makes law digitally accessible exploiting its proprietary AI-powered electronic machine-readable format of legal documents
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Aptus.AI's AI assistant is transforming the legal and compliance sectors.   Founded in 2018, Aptus.AI is the Italian startup that puts the law at your fingertips, making it digitally accessible through the first truly reliable and always up-to-date AI assistant in the legal field.   Starting from highly regulated industries such as Finance and Insurance, Aptus.AI has developed and patented proprietary machine-readable technology that automates regulatory monitoring and change management, reports draft generation, impact and risk analysis, establishing itself as a leader in financial compliance.   Supported by the investments secured in 2023, Aptus.AI has extended the application of its proprietary technology to the legal sector, developing the first reliable and always up-to-date AI assistant in the legal domain. This assistant automates the drafting of all types of legal documents, updates legal strategies, and compares legal texts, leveraging Virtual Experts specialized in specific tasks to support legal professionals and highly regulated industries.   Today, Aptus.AI collaborates with prestigious clients such as Intesa Sanpaolo and Generali Investments, as well as various international organizations and some of the most prominent Italian law firms.

Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: D-Heart is the first smartphone ECG device that simple to use, clinically reliable, portable and affordable. It allows anyone to perform a hospital-level ECG in total autonomy and to send the results  to the 24/7 tele-cardiology service or to your trusted doctor. D-Heart biomedical start-up was founded in 2015 thanks to the work of Nicolò Briante and Niccolò Maurizi, at the time two young students in the interdisciplinary environment of the Almo Collegio Borromeo of Pavia. Maurizi, a young doctor researcher in cardiology at the University of Florence, When he was sixteen, Maurizi was hit by a myocardial infraction. He decided to became a doctor and transform his problem into an opportunity. Thanks to the help and business expertise of his roommate, Briante, they created D-Heart, the first smartphone ECG device that combines the usability required by the patient and reliability of the ECG wanted by the doctor.

Nel 2017 l’iniziativa ha prodotto ricavi per €300k, nel 2018 per €1,8m e nel 2019 il fatturato si è attestato a €2,9m.
Il team è composto da 16 dipendenti incluso l'AD e, dalla nascita della società, hanno sempre investito in ricerca e brevetti.
Sono in raccolta per €4m e stanno chiudendo round con un club deal per €500k.
Il CEO della società vorrebbe chiudere il round d’investimento entro marzo 2021; prossimamente integreranno la presentazione con un light business plan.

Description: Doralia is the unique high-end jewelry marketplace where Italian artisan are connected to a global audience without intermediaries
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Doralia is an Italian start-up founded by Massimiliano Brustia. Doralia is a marketplace that connects Italian jewelry-makers to customers around the world, with a specific focus on the US market. The company was founded in Italy, where its legal office is located, and maintains its presence in the four Italian jewelry districts (Valenza, Arezzo, Napoli, Vicenza). Doralia plans to build a solid position in the US through its subsidiary Doralia Inc (based in New York). Doralia focuses on offering «Made in Italy» jewelry in Europe and the US, guaranteeing wide visibility through digital channels and focusing on communication throughout different Social Networks, in collaboration with industry Influencers. Its customers are buyers seeking high-end Italian jewelry directly from the craftsmen through a seamless online experience. The business plan of the company forecasts ~$17 million revenues in 2025 (with a CAGR of 100%), thanks to investments and partnerships in the US. To finance its expansion, Doralia is looking for Investor Partners to raise $500k in 2021.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods
Most Popular Trademark Class: Precious Metals and their alloys; jewelry; time-keeping instruments

DESCRIPTION:
TimeFlow nasce come marketplace per connettere da un lato le aziende e dall’altro risorse IT in ambito sviluppo
software, con l’obiettivo di superare i tools attualmente presenti sul mercato per la ricerca e gestione dei fornitori IT, che rendono l’intero processo lento ed inefficiente. Nel 2023, la Società ha lanciato una piattaforma SaaS che aiuta le aziende nella gestione del proprio parco fornitori (ricerca, gestione e pagamento).
Note:
Ci hanno aggiornato che hanno presentato domanda per il bando "contratto di programma" della Regione Puglia, che dovrebbe garantire €1,2m a fondo perduto.
Inoltre, la società sta pensando all'acquisizione di https://www.niuma.it/. De Palma ci ha aggiornato che Danese sta andando avanti con le interlocuzione. Si tratta di un'azienda attualmente guidata da imprenditori anziani che vorrebbero realizzare un passaggio generazionale. Ha chiuso il 2024 con €6m di ricavi ed EBITDA pari a €900k. Ha +100 dipendenti e circa 45 clienti. L'ipotesi è vendita al 100%. De Palma inverà a Danese nei prossimi giorni richiesta di coumentazione (es. bilancio 2022-2024, BP 2025-2027, lista dei principali clienti). Ricevute prime informazioni.
Lato secondario, comunicato nostro interesse per procedere all'acquisto delle quote (deadline per esecuzione secondario fissata al 28 maggio 2025). Comunicare feedback a GC su se ricevere o meno AML venditori.
De Palma vorrebbe stipulare D&O (sentito Giovanni Pioletti).
DUE DILIGENCE (appointed advisors):
Contabile/Fiscale: Studio Pirola.
Privacy & Cybersecurity: We.Do.
ESG: EY.

Description: Quid powers human intuition with machine intelligence, enabling organizations to make decisions that matter.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Full Description: Quid is a platform that searches, analyzes and visualizes the world’s collective intelligence to help answer strategic questions. It draws connections between big ideas, giving your brain more power than you ever dreamed possible. Quid software technology specializes in the analysis of text-based data. The product utilizes implicit network analysis and graph theory to create advanced interactive visualizations. Quid proprietary algorithms employ artificial intelligence and Natural Language Processing to quickly find insights across millions of data points. The company’s goal is to allow non-technical users in enterprise organizations to independently access the world’s high-value information for unique and shareable insights. Quid users have access to proprietary data sets (e.g. news articles, blog posts, company profiles, and patents) and can also bring their own data. On January 28, 2020, Quid merged with the social media analytics company, Netbase Solutions. The combined company joined forces under a collective name, Netbase Quid.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Design, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Bob Goodson, Kirill Makharinsky, Sean Gourley
Top 5 Investors: Founders Fund, Salesforce Ventures, Artis Ventures, SV Angel, Atomico
Most Popular Trademark Class: Advertising; business

To do this we offer entrepreneurial support, connecting the original ideas of young entrepreneurs with companies that can support their projects through Open Innovation strategies, by creating business modeling programs and accelerating possible partnerships with other companies. The company’s core business consists in the provision of high-quality analysis of aerial inspections conducted using drones and remote thermal/multispectral sensor mainly in the photovoltaic industry. DESCRIPTION: Dispositivo per testare l’effetto dei medicinali su cervello e neuroni, attraverso propri microchip (e algoritimi di AI).
Note:
Obiettivo per il 2021 è un fatturato di CHF2m, i founder stanno cercando fondi per €4m.

Industries: Biotechnology, Health Care, Life Science, Neuroscience
Description: 3Brain is the world's first company that sells large scale high resolution MEA recording platforms and CMOS-MEA biochips.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: 3Brain is the world’s first company to connect cells with sophisticated silicon chips in cell culture plates. Stemming from our passion for technology and scientific progress, our co-founders have worked for more than 15 years on CMOS-powered cell-electronic interfaces with the aim of boosting research in major fields like neuroscience, ophthalmology and cardiology. After being the first to introduce CMOS-based HD-MEA (high-density microelectrode array) to overcome passive MEA limitations, we are now setting up the next standard by introducing the CorePlate™ technology, a multiwell device for advanced cell-based analysis backed by per well logical processing cores. Our unfaltering research and development are aimed at improving in vitro cell-based screening outputs and thus raising the potential of finding new treatments for brain disease.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: Eurostars
Most Popular Trademark Class: Scientific and electric apparatus and instruments

DESCRIPTION: Iniziativa attiva nel data management e cybersecurity in termini di protezione e gestione dati.

Description: ADVANCED USER DATA AND SECURITY MANAGEMENT FOR ANY DATA-DRIVEN ORGANIZATION
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Data Rover, like all “rovers”, has a scientific and business mission to accomplish. Go over the terrain, collect the data, and determine if the environment we are in is safe and hospitable or not, then exploit and deliver! Data Rover combines the two domains of Risk Management and Data Science giving Organisations the ability to leverage upon their own data in order to extract valuable information and to secure their business processes and assets. Any company in the world that considers their data as a valuable asset and fundamental to their success and existence needs Data Rover, be it for an emerging company to a giant corporate. Data Rover is a peer to peer and/or cloud based software solution that collects and analyses unstructured data usage on any file system, its content and its risk vulnerability,  delivers valuable information to the data custodians, CISO, CTO, DPO, project stakeholders, business managers, legal office and so on. Data Rover’s finite objectives are multi-fold: check and clean up the environment, safeguard and enhance the business critical interests of the organization, and deliver a thriving business opportunity to those who promote and work with our solution.
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software
Founders: Christopher Charles-Paul Shelton-Agar, Gabriele Marini, Leonardo Zanus, Luca Pallanti

Description: Saas service to support artistic and cultural heritage from artworks condition monitoring to fundraising with NFT
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: AerariumChain is an ArtTech, InsurTech and Crypto Saas service to support Museums, Foundations and Private collectors from artworks condition monitoring to fundraising with NFT. Description: Harnessing AI and blockchain to empower individuals in sustainability. A global environmental action platform, recognized by the UN and EU.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: AWorld is a leading SaaS platform committed to fostering sustainability and environmental consciousness among individuals and organizations. With a foundation built on cutting-edge technologies like AI, blockchain, and data analytics, AWorld offers a unique ecosystem designed to measure, incentivize, and educate users about their carbon footprint and the impact of their daily choices on the environment. The platform provides a dynamic and interactive experience through its AWorld ActNow app and API integration capabilities, enabling seamless incorporation into third-party applications, intranets, and systems. This versatile approach allows AWorld to engage a wide range of users, including employees, students, citizens, and consumers, in meaningful sustainability efforts. AWorld's innovative Impact Engagement™ methodology combines real-time monitoring of CO2 emissions with personalized recommendations, challenges, and rewards, encouraging users to adopt more sustainable lifestyles. Through gamification and micro-learning, the platform makes sustainability accessible and actionable for everyone, supporting organizations in their ESG and NetZero goals. Trusted by prestigious entities like the United Nations and the European Commission, AWorld has been recognized as the Best App for Good in 2023. Its client roster includes renowned global corporations, cities, universities, and event organizers, demonstrating the platform's scalability and effectiveness in driving change. Whether through its standalone app or integrated solutions, AWorld is dedicated to transforming environmental awareness into action, making it easier for individuals and organizations to contribute to a healthier planet. With a strong commitment to privacy, security, and user engagement, AWorld continues to innovate, providing tools and insights that empower users to make a real difference.
Industry Groups: Apps, Education, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Sustainability
Founders: Alessandro Armillotta, Alessandro Lancieri, Marco Armellino

DESCRIPTION: Piattaforma collaborativa che permette alle aziende alimentari di ottenere facilmente visibilità di processi e prodotti nella supply chain
Note:

In raccolta per €2m (di cui €400k già allocati a investitori attuali - CDP, Digital Magics, Rockstart)
6 clienti tra cui Unes, già attivi in Olanda e Spagna
